lead_paragraph: LEE--Dr. Isabella, age 93, died October 24, in her home in New York City after a long illness. Widow of Chinese artist and teacher Jim Lee. Although she earned her Doctorate and was a Professor at NYU, her true calling and lifelong commitment, work, struggle, and passion was for women's rights, civil rights, the labor movement and peace. She is survived by her devoted friend and caregiver Linda King. Her intelligence, wit, humor, and caring will be sorely missed by many who knew and loved her.
